metadata.title: CVE-2021-46238 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: GPAC v1.1.0 was discovered to contain a stack overflow via the function gf_node_get_name () at scenegraph/base_scenegraph.c. This vulnerability can lead to a program crash, causing a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
